channel.title: osint on CyberKoopas
channel.description: Recent content in osint on CyberKoopas

item.title: [Midnight final] Osint - Esnarcotrafiquants
item.description: 1/5 One of our pilots has been missing for 5 days, our investigation has had no results, but we still have a lead. We know he has a son, and it's possible that he can tell us more about his father. He's apparently very active on a social network - his name should be idrisrsbel7. Format : MCTF{} To begin this investigation we have an username : idrisrsbel7 Our first objectives is to find Idris Father’s .

item.title: [Hackday final] Osint - My runaway daughter
item.description: This SOCMINT Osint challenge start with this post that gave us the Facebook profile of the missing daughter. On her profile nothing except her name and a picture. By googling her name we can find her LinkedIn. One of her LinkedIn post we can find her resume link on a Google Drive. Inspecting the element of the web page of the drive, we can find a crucial information to continue our investigation her email : julie.

item.title: [Hackday final] Osint - Where & When
item.description: **The flag format is : `city_AAAA:MM:dd_HH`** The city is in lowercase and without accent, and the time is approximated to the nearest hour. By using Google Lens we found that this pictures are Nime’s arena. Using Google maps we can determine where exactly the picture was taken. Now to find when the picture was taken we check the metadata but of course there were deleted. So we use the sun clearly visible.

item.title: [Midnight qualif] Osint - Time Traveler
item.description: 1/3 It is said that a time traveler is roaming the social networks right now... his username? "ibm_5100_" Find out more about this person. Let’s dig this username using WhatsMyName : It’s fit the description about a time traveler. But nothing more… Since we know it’s linked to time travel, let’s use WaybackMachine to dig the past of this twitter account : we found one archive with on it the first flag : First Flag : MCTF{t1Mâ‚¬_7r4v3L_O}

item.title: [Hackday qualif] Osint - A starry night sky
item.description: The large library within the Cancer sector contains many documents of all types and from all periods. Among these documents, some have deteriorated over time to the point of finding only snippets of information. This is for example the case of this image where we guess the words 9:00 p.m. and 2022. Try to find the place and the month of shooting. **Flag format: `HACKDAY{COUNTRY_MONTH}`** In English and in capitals !

item.title: [Hackday qualif] Osint - Vroooom
item.description: The MIA (Intergalactic Automobile Museum) has just received a donation of several photo books from an old (probably very old) car collector. Among the documents was a photo of a car, but the curator was unable to determine its origin... He then decides to call on you, will you be able to give the name of the event where this photo was taken? **The flag is to be constructed in the form: `HACKDAY{.
